trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli would have you hear out Wawkesa's request.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wawkesa.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the hearty packed lunch to the forgetful guide in Marsh Ligaka.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Yubli.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_YUBLI_000_001<tab>I have a request from Wawkesa─something about making an urgent delivery to a guide out in the middle of a sightseeing tour.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_YUBLI_000_002<tab>Could you please talk to him and see what you can do to help?
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_010<tab>Did Yubli send you my way? Good, because I really need someone to make a food delivery.

TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_011<tab>When the tours head out to far-flung places, I pack lunches for the groups to take with them─one each for the customers, and one for the guide. Can't have them going hungry, now, can I?

TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_012<tab>Well, today, a guide friend of mine took the lunches with her as she usually does. Being an incurable scatterbrain, though, she only grabbed the customer packs and forgot to take her own.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_013<tab>My scatterbrained friend has headed off on a tour without her lunch again...

TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_014<tab>I need someone to deliver a meal to our forgetful guide before she pushes too far on an empty stomach. You'll find her somewhere around Marsh Ligaka─hopefully upright and not fainted by the wayside.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_015<tab>My friend's Tonawawtan, like me. Head to Marsh Ligaka and follow the sounds of her belly rumbling.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TONAWAWTA05223_000_020<tab>Oooh, I'm so hungry I'm starting to smell the lunch I forgot to bring. ...Wait, do you have it with you!?
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TONAWAWTA05223_000_021<tab>And here I was resigned to finishing the tour on an empty stomach! Thank you for hiking all this way just for me!

TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TONAWAWTA05223_000_022<tab>We'll take a break to eat the food Wawkesa packed for us, then we'll be on our way. You can let them know back at Dock Poga that everything's going to schedule!
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_TONAWAWTA05223_000_023<tab>Once we're done eating here, we'll get back on the trail. Thanks again for bringing my lunch!
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_WAWKESA_000_025<tab>Did you manage to find my hungry friend? I reckon she'd forget her own feet if they weren't attached to her legs.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_YUBLI_000_030<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You were able to make Wawkesa's delivery, then?
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_YUBLI_000_031<tab>He puts a lot of thought into those lunches of his, making sure they're both filling and filled with a good mix of healthy foods.
TEXT_BANPEL125_05223_YUBLI_000_032<tab>Such meals are essential for those longer tours into the wilderness, so hopefully his forgetful friend will remember hers next time!
